item.title: Archery Machine
item.description: Principles Field Weather Rain Cloud uncheckedWhen it start to rain, look at the clouds: Look heavy and dark It’s going to rain heavily after a while ==> Run Fast Not little, but thin The rain would be minor and stop soon ==> Stay and Watch

item.title: Note-taking machine
item.description: Machine source and attribution This machine borrowed vastly from Jethro Kuan’s way of note-taking. (print org-capture-templates)
